2.text: For building a system that can communicate data from the factories all over the country to the capital, we need a network. But Chile does not have enough computers to install them in every region. We need another solution.

choices.text: I have a friend at ENTEL, the National Telecommunications Enterprise. I will ask him for help!

3.text: Try to talk to Sr. Batanero, the head of ENTEL. This is the National Telecommunications Enterprise. He might be able to help!

4.text: Perfect! Personal connections are always the best way to cut bureaucracy! Let's hope your friend can help us out.

5.text: Hello, Senora. My name is Batanero. I am the director of ENTEL, our National Telecommunications Enterprise. Can I help you somehow? Be quick, I am very busy!

choices.text: Yes, do you have any telex machines available for a new project CORFOR is working on? How many are installed in the country?
Yes, I am looking for my friend Paulo. He works here. Could you direct me to him?

6.text: Telex machines? No! There are just a handful installed. And we don't have this stuff lying around, of course. Please excuse me, I have work to do!

7.text: Sure, he should be at his desk over there. *points to the far side of the room* Do you see him, in the red shirt? Please run along. I have work to do!

9.text: Alba! Long time, no see. How are you? What are you doing here? I thought you work at CORFO!

choices.text: Hello Paulo! I am on an errand for work and thought I'd say hi. Unfortunately, Sr. Batanero cannot help me.

10.text: Oh, Batanero! He only thinks, he knows, what's going on here. We, the workers, are the ones with the real knowledge. What do you need?

choices.text: Well, CORFO is working on a new project and they need a lot of telex machines to install all over the country. But buying new machines are a lot more expensive.

11.text: Never fear, Alba. I know a little secret. There's an Aladdin's cave in the basement of this building that will hold exactly the treasure you were hoping for! Follow me...

12.text: How are you doing, Alba? I think, to get further into the room, you'll have to push some boxes around. Have you found what you were looking for?

choices.text: Yes, I need to go back to CORFO to tell them the good news! Thank you, Paulo.
No, there seem to be some boxes in the way and I got stuck.

13.text: That's great, Alba! I'm glad I could help! I'll take you back there.

14.text: That's no problem, Alba. I will help you put them back where they were.

15.text: Alba, have you had any success?

choices.text: Yes, there are hundreds of telex machines in the basement of the ENTEL building. It's exactly what we need.
No, unfortunately I haven't found anything, yet.

16.text: Wonderful!  Now we can get started with the real work. Thank you Alba!

17.text: Try talking to the people at ENTEL. They might be able to help you!
